content:
Please recommend a 2023 model car that I should buy. 

As context, I often drive with my family around New York City, and also drive 200 miles weekly through upstate New York roads.

Here are the rest of my parameters
- I can spend up to $35,000 on this purchase
- the car should be easy to parallel park in dense urban areas
- the car should be responsive at low speeds
- the car should be one of the safest amongst new cars for 2023
- the car should have a tailgate
- the car should be fun to drive on dynamic roads
- the car should be good for driving in the winter
- I want the car to have comforts like memorized seating positions and ventilated seats
